Pacing was a little bit off, but it was a good blend of different elements. Better than Age of Ultron no doubt.

Warning - spoilers!!!

This film is DARK and it is HEAVY but it left me pondering what I witnessed, and overall, it blew me away. This is by far the best Avengers film to date and the best Marvel to movie adaptation I've witnessed. Why not 5 stars? There are a few glaring things I find wrong with the portrayal of our superheroes. First of all, as always, Black Widow is way overpowered. On the other hand, she's not featured as much in this film (just given little scenes here and there). Vision is WAY underutilized. He's just a pawn in these films, and his abilities are not utilized at all. Scarlet Witch is not featured as much as she could've been. The Hulk is afraid??? Kind of ridiculous and convenient (like how he never faced Hela in Ragnarok). Captain America is featured a tad less than you'd think he would be (and so is Bucky). Black Panther has some cool scenes in Wakanda, and honestly, the Wakanda scenes are better in this film than in Black Panther. Beyond that, there is one scene that bugs me... It's when the Avengers have Thanos restrained and they're trying to take the Infinity Gauntlet off of his hand.... Why don't they stab him and kill him then??? There's a scene where Gamora kills Thanos (but only a simulated Thanos) by stabbing him in the neck. It seems so odd that they would have that scene in there and then have Thanos subdued and not attempt something similar. Those are literally the only things that bug me about this film. Other than that, it's simply amazing.
Crazy movie. Decently go watch. Don't fall for any reviews.
The end made the entire movie such out the ass.

An amazing amalgation of 10 years worth of movies into an action packed, humorous and surprisingly emotional climax . It tries to (mostly) ties up most of their character arcs and  inivietably sets up the "real" final battle next year,
Congratulations Marvel Studio's, you deserve the money for all the hard work.

Although it is quite choppy for a bit due to the many characters, each of them is well balanced thanks to great humor, awesome special effects, entertaining action, brilliant writing, and Josh Brolin's spectacular performance as one of the best villains in film history.
